alert.note: Alert for Russell; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Russell and central Washington Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Allison Gap to 12 miles southwest of Cleveland Va. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bristol Va, Abingdon, Lebanon, Glade Spring, Lindell, Holston, Hansonville, Emory-Meadow View, Benhams and Rosedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
